area: up to two 5-foot bursts that don't overlap
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">[Whirling Flames](/Spells.aspx?ID=766)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cursebound" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=320" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 234 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Mystery**
[Flames](/Mysteries.aspx?ID=5)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Area** up to two 5-foot bursts that don't overlap

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

You call forth a storm of whirling flames, engulfing all creatures in that area and dealing 5d6 fire damage with a basic Reflex save.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The damage increases by 3d6, and you can add another nonoverlapping 5-foot burst to the area.
name: Whirling Flames

text: Whirling Flames Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 234 2.0 Mystery Flames Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 30 feet Area up to two 5-foot bursts that don't overlap Saving Throw basic Reflex --- You call forth a storm of whirling flames, engulfing all creatures in that area and dealing 5d6 fire damage with a basic Reflex save. --- Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 3d6, and you can add another nonoverlapping 5-foot burst to the area.
